document_data.name: Elvarado Chaserperi
document_data.mainbody: '''Elvarado Chaserperi''' was one of the potential heirs to the [[Chaserperi]] clan in the late mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Elvarado owned a number of [[Amn]]ian vineyards; they were used for a splendid dry white [[wine|vintage]] called [[Old Blue Stag]]. Some other sweet [[berry]] wines were also brewed out of his produce.
document_data.Relationships: [[Chancereene Chaserperi]] was considering him as a successor for [[Faereldan Chaserperi]].
